00021 class ThArray
00022 {
00023 public:
00024         ThArray( unsigned int size, unsigned int alignment = 16 );

00026 
00028         unsigned int            GetSize() const                                         {       return ( _buffer.GetSize() / sizeof( _T ) );    }
00029 
00033         _T*                                     Acquire( bool wait = true )                     {       return ( _T* )_buffer.Acquire( wait );                  }
00034         const _T*                       Acquire( bool wait = true ) const       {       return ( const _T* )_buffer.Acquire( wait );    }
00035         void                            Release() const                                         {       return _buffer.Release();                                               }
00036

00040         void                            RaiseSignal()                                           {       _buffer.GetSignal().Raise();                                    }
00041         void                            LowerSignal()                                           {       _buffer.GetSignal().Lower();                                    }
00042

00044         ThArray( const ThArray& ) : _buffer( 1, 1 ) { }
